message: We go around the room each giving 6 minute updates in the order we arrived.
we run through any agenda items that were posted to the wiki, then ask if anyone has anything else to discuss.  if there are a lot of new people, we go around and introduce ourselves.

We meet bi-weekly for about 2 hrs.  Usually 20-25 members attend.  We have an agenda broken into 1) board of directors business (landlord, bills, etc), 2) working group updates (web, PR, etc), 3) old business carry-over items, 4) new business, 5) punch-list review (our master GTD to-do list), and adjourn.  Our VP has a cowbell that he rings loud and often to keep the group on point; best idea ever.
Hah! We have a cowbell too!  The person who is giving their update gets the cowbell to alert people that they are giving an update.   I agree, it is a great tool to have.
Each Tuesday, after 18:00, we meet and make. Formal meetings that can decide things, are announced >7 days before, on our mailing list.
Each Tuesday, 18:30-22:00 the facilities where Umeå Hackerspace resides have open invitations to see activities therein. Anything from 3 to 10 people show up, with the occasional newcomer.
